original_title: US Warship in Trincomalee during weekend
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); USS Charleston (LCS – 18) of the U.S. Navy arrived at the Port of Trincomalee on the morning of 11th March 2023, and left the following day.
USS Charleston (LCS – 18) is a 127.4m long Independence – Class Littoral Combat Ship manned by 100 crew members and the ship is commanded by Commander Lamson, A.A.

The Commanding Officer of the visiting ship called on the Commander Eastern Naval Area and Commandant Volunteer Naval Force, Rear Admiral Dammika Kumara at the Eastern Naval Command Headquarters on 11th March. During the cordial discussion, they exchanged views on several matters of bilateral importance.
